sense.def:
To embrace someone
pomeni dati roke okoli nekoga, da pokažemo svojo nagnjenost do te osebe.

seg.quote: Before she could embrace him he stepped away.
They greeted us with warm embraces.
The course embraces elements of chemistry, physics, and engineering.

sense.def:
To embrace a religion, political system, or idea
pomeni začeti verjeti oziroma verovati v neko vero, politično ureditev ali zamisel;
